snippet: Disney’s coming electronic bracelets will allow its theme park visitors to pay for things as well as guide them to attractions, but the company will gain access to valuable information on its customers.
abstract: Walt Disney World will introduce new electronic bracelet system in spring 2013 that will guide visitors to attractions and allow them to pay electronically for individual charges; new system will also allow company to gain greater access to valuable customer information.
lead_paragraph: Disney’s coming electronic bracelets will allow its theme park visitors to pay for things as well as guide them to attractions, but the company will gain access to valuable information on its customers.

headline.seo: At Disney Parks, a Bracelet Meant to Build Loyalty (and Sales)
